title: Entrepreneurship & Innovation Awareness Program (MSME Schemes)
desc: An awareness program on Entrepreneurship and MSME schemes was held on 21.01.2025, led by Dr. G. Seenuvasan, District Program Manager, EDII-TN.

title: Guest Lecture - AI & IoT for Industry 4.0
desc: A guest lecture on “Integration of AI and IoT for Industry 4.0” was conducted to provide students with insights into how artificial intelligence and IoT technologies are revolutionizing modern industrial systems.

title: District-Level Speech Competition - II Prize
desc: Ms. S. Kaviya, III Year CSE (2022-26 Batch), won Second Prize and a cash award of ₹7,000 in the District-Level Speech Competition organized by the Tamil Nadu Government Tamil Development Department.

title: Guest Speaker - Deep Learning & Neural Networks
desc: Dr. C. Pabitha served as the Resource Person for a session at Vel Tech Multi Tech, Department of AI & DS, delivering a talk on “Deep Learning with Neural Networks: Powering Today's Smart Systems.”

title: International Conference Paper Presentation
desc: Dr. C. Pabitha successfully presented a research paper titled “IoT-Integrated Deep Learning Approach for Food Freshness Monitoring” at an International Conference, showcasing advancements in smart food quality detection.

title: Paper Presentation - Advances in Sensor, Control & Safety Networks
desc: Dr. M. Murugan and Ms. R. Anitha successfully presented their paper at the International Conference on Advances in Sensor, Control, and Safety Networks, contributing innovative research insights.

title: Free Mentorship Selection - Xebia NDS India Pvt Ltd
desc: Mr. Ashwin and Ms. Gayathri were selected for free mentorship at Xebia NDS India Pvt Ltd, providing them exposure to industry-driven technical training.

title: Project Selection - Naan Mudhalvan Niral Thiruvizha 2.0
desc: A project guided by Dr. G. Sangeetha was selected for Naan Mudhalvan - Niral Thiruvizha 2.0, recognizing the innovation and societal impact of the work.

title: Manpu Migu Magalir Viruthu 2025 Award
desc: Ms. S. Shanthi received the Manpu Migu Magalir Viruthu 2025, awarded by Vagai Thamizh Sangam, in recognition of her contributions and achievements.

title: Participation in Startup Bootcamp
desc: Ms. S. Shanthi along with III Year CSE2 students participated in a Bootcamp organized by the Tamil Nadu Startup and Innovation Mission, gaining hands-on exposure to entrepreneurial and innovation practices.
